nodes.description: 2006年11月23日萨德尔城六个汽车炸弹袭击，造成超过200人死亡
nodes.support_text: 23 November 2006: More than 200 people killed as six car bombs detonate in the Sadr City neighbourhood of Baghdad

nodes.description: 2007年8月14日针对雅兹迪社区的自杀式爆炸，造成超过500人死亡
nodes.support_text: 14 August 2007: Multiple suicide bombings targeting the Yazidi community in northern Iraq kill more than 500 people

nodes.description: 2009年8月19日绿区附近两个汽车炸弹袭击，至少155人死亡
nodes.support_text: 19 August 2009: Two car bombs near the Green Zone in Baghdad kill at least 155 people

nodes.description: 2014年6月12日Camp Speicher大屠杀，1700名军事新兵被IS杀害
nodes.support_text: 12 June 2014: Up to 1,700 military recruits are killed by IS at a former US base, an incident known as the Camp Speicher massacre

nodes.description: 2014年8月14日IS在北纬省杀害数百名雅兹迪男子和男孩
nodes.support_text: August 14, 2014: IS kill hundreds of minority Yazidi men and boys in Nineveh province, north-west of Baghdad

nodes.description: 2016年3月7日Karrada区IS使用新型混合化学炸弹袭击，造成292人死亡
nodes.support_text: On 3 July, 292 Iraqis lost their lives here... This biggest single attack on civilians since the Iraq war of 2003

nodes.description: 2016年7月3日Karrada区爆炸后伊拉克政府最终撤除失效安检设备
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi finally ordered their removal from checkpoints... the biggest single attack on civilians since the Iraq war of 2003
